mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, password, nickname, email, phone, user_image, image_path, level, reg_date, update_date, last_login, out_yn) values(#{user_id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{user_image}, #{image_path}, #{level}, #{reg_date}, #{update_date}, #{last_login}, 'n')
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from user where nickname = ${nickname}
select count(*) from user where email = ${email}
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password} where user_idx = #{user_idx}
update user set email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, user_image = #{user_image}, image_path = #{image_path}
update user set out_yn = 'y' where user_idx = #{user_idx}
